title: Latest Update causing PvP.Net Disconnection
body: The latest update has caused my league client and some of my friends to constantly disconnect us from the Pvp.Net. If anyone else is having the same problem feel free to talk about it or if you have a solution.

replies.body: Yep same i have just upgraded to win10 and thought it was that but it only started on last patch so thats common. Also not getting in game dc just in match making all the time and while in champ select.

> [{quoted}](name=RaveRexx,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=02lT4srJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-05T12:17:07.173+0000)
>
> Yep same i have just upgraded to win10 and thought it was that but it only started on last patch so thats common. Also not getting in game dc just in match making all the time and while in champ select.

I have the exact same problem. Need help cos I'm in my promos and a D/C from the lobby counts as a loss... and I just D/C's because of this client constantly D/C'ing from pvp.net UGH
Are you all on Windows 10?  Wondering if there's anything else you might have in common - ISP, Location etc?
